nodes.text: The B4J4 security droid was a Blujay-developed security droid. Armed with a pair of heavy blasters with a stun setting, a snare pistol or two grapple-cable shooters firing ShrinCord, and its own repulsorlift generator, the B4J4 security droids were useful security droids found guarding the headquarters of some of the most prestigious galactic corporations.
